caption.p: Viral titers expressed as Log 10 GEC in OS and CS obtained from chickens inoculated with H7N1 ( A, B) or H5N8 ( C, D) HPAIVs at different time points. Viral titers are represented as the mean values ± SEM. The numbers above the columns represent the number of chickens shedding virus out of the total sampled. GEC: Genome equivalent copies; Dpi: day post-inoculation.
